page.title: 07EMPLOYMENT,CAREW AREA,TENBY.
page.content: The{majority of people}in this area are{employed.}Our survey suggests that only{approx.11% are unemployed}and {approx.22%}of people questioned have {retired. Employment within the actual area is very limited.It is mostly farm work and service work_e.g.bar and cleaning staff. The majority of people are employed outside our area.{44 people in our {survey work in Pembroke Dock,22 in {Tenby,11 in the Haverfordwest area. It would appear that quite a large number of women work,mostly part_ time. Of the{females}in the area who are employed{teaching}appears to be the {most frequent occupation.}For{males {H.G.V.drivers are in the majority, followed by clerks in both categories.
